messages.body: $AUY The share price is just floating around with every dollar up or down in gold now. The earnings should at least provide some pretty good support or price increase. It has pre sold itself going into earnings which I like. I am fairly confident in this one now & into next year. The odds are in our favor. Good luck longs.
$AUY told yaa!! this is piece of shit
Yamana Gold Inc. to report earnings on October 29, 2020. Earnings per share (EPS) estimate: $0.08 $AUY https://srnk.us/go/2255228

messages.body: $AUY Do you know what would happen if someone came out from government & said they were extremely close to a stimulus deal right now? Not saying it will happen but nothing - and I mean nothing, surprises me any more. Remember, Trump wants the market in good shape for the election. Just a thought.
$AUY EOD 5.73.  Watch.  We are going to skip .20 in an hour.
$AUY We are back to June price levels. I don't see this going below June lows of $4.80 area. We loaded heavily to build out 1/2 our position in the 5.35 areas.
$AUY oh boy could be a buyer here on any more weakness. Imo.

$AUY We are buyers at this price & will add again sub $5 which we expect. We also figure to double our money on this one. We will also be buyers of physical gold after Biden victory. Gold should be around $2500 by next summer.

$AUY You're probably looking at low 5's here tomorrow. According to news some countries in Europe may start closing borders. Then you have spreading virus here & probably no stimulus until Biden does a massive one in Feb. So this probably gets worse before it gets better. However, once Biden stimulates with about 3 times what Trump did you will be sitting at $10/share. These are are the accumulation times for the big run in a few months. For that reason we are bullish.
$AUY all gains wiped out in one day. Go figure!
$AUY BIG blocks being sold off.  Will sit on 9Ks  not buying more yet.
$AUY  Buying at these low levels!
$AUY bloodbath

$AUY Let’s see... Average break even price I believe is around 1025 an oz to mine gold. Seems dumb that people panic when gold goes down to 1880 an oz. lol. Do the math idiots. Earning report tomorrow will be huge. Can’t hide that
$AUY $BTG literally the last 4 quarters the week of earnings the MM's crash gold so these companies don't spike up. its so messed up.
$AUY This is almost comical. I guess you have to shake the pretenders from the contenders.

$AUY TEAM WTL MORNING BRIEFING :  Looking like a rough time for company earnings report. CDE is getting hit as gold is plummeting this morning. Gold is down considerably from the summer highs & is looking for support. The best to hope for is a flat day for the SP tomorrow. Some interesting data to think about. There have been 13 internal Republican polls on the elections. All 13 show Trump losing the battleground states he won in 2016. This is why Trump is now in full blown panic mode doing  3 a day rallies. I think Trump is going to get beaten badly. That is also the only reason I remain bullish on gold & gold miners. Biden is set to do massive stimulus which will send precious metals on the next rocket ride. I also look for EV's to do even better than they are doing now along with infrastructure projects that will support iron, copper, & nickel. For TEAM WTL this is Mark Rawlins. Have a great day.

links.title: Investor Interest in the Red Lake Mining District Continues to Rise Following C$15 Million Investment in Pure Gold
links.description: NEW YORK, Oct. 28, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- Market experts a second rally in gold prices is on the horizon, making now an ideal time to get into the market. The falling US dollar, the upcoming US presidential election, and stagnant interest rates are just a few factors that could affect gold prices.

messages.body: $AUY So the stock is down about $2 from it's early August highs. That does set it up well going into earnings. Just not too confident it can break out of it's range as the pops get sold quickly without advances in gold prices. I'm long based on a Biden victory & a massive stimulus party.

$AG Happy Q3 Earnings Report season!!! 
Tomorrow we get $CDE, $AUY reporting earnings among other miners. $AG reporting on 11/4!! 
Fireworks show on 11/5!!!
$AUY Until there is a 2nd stimulus these stocks are all stuck in this range,
